entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except snow inland early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023
